title: How ‘silicon cities’ Austin, Miami are tackling tech growth, affordability woes - KXAN.com
content: How ‘silicon cities’ Austin, Miami are tackling tech growth, affordability woes  KXAN.com
description: On Sunday, Austin Mayor Steve Adler and Miami Mayor Francis Suarez sat down during the South by Southwest Conference & Festivals to talk about becoming some of the leading national tech hubs, …
